example.name: autogen1
example.text: A proviso to that promise is that a minimum of 35 states reach settlement agreements before next Tuesday .
example.arg: that a minimum of 35 states reach settlement agreements before next Tuesday

example.name: autogen2
example.text: But now the possibility of `` diplomatic movement '' -LRB- Vietnam 's withdrawal , the Baker initiative -RRB- has put that plan on hold , with the proviso that if the going got rough , the U.S. would then rearm the opposition .
example.arg: that if the going got rough , the U.S. would then rearm the opposition
